definition: to mix/to mix in/to toss (a salad)

sentences.english: Wheat seed-treated With triadimefon is one of the most important measures to control powdery mildew of Wheat.
sentences.chinese: 粉鏽寧拌種是小麥白粉病應急防治的關鍵技術之一。

sentences.english: Temik seed covering and 3911 seed dressing are the best, while Pirimi-carb is the poorest.
sentences.chinese: 涕滅威蓋種和3911拌種效果最佳，抗蚜威最差。

sentences.english: The invention also provides a preparation method for the seed dressing.
sentences.chinese: 本發明還提供了此種拌種劑的製備方法。

sentences.english: The effects of seed dressing and base fertilizer with water-retaining agent on wheat growth were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了保水劑拌種和基施對小麥生長的影響。
